attributes.review: When I first opened this app I almost threw up, just at the sight of it. It is a horrendous app and should never have been created. When I opened it up it showed me a picture of some horrible creature that made me almost gouge my eyes out in fear and disgust. I don’t know what it was but I never want to see it again. 🤢 this app is just overall a horrible thing and needs to be deleted... why would anyone want an app that portrays those horrible pictures. Honestly disgusting to see. 😡
attributes.title: horrible... absolutely disgusting

attributes.review: I downloaded the app🤩and my phone started to glitch🙀🙀!!! all my app icons went missing😭😰lil huddy 😖appeared on my home screen and started to say the n-word!!🤬🤯💔then my room started to shake and i heard the loud, obnoxious sound pulsating through my ear drums, “TRUMP 2020”. All my anime posters had been instantly ripped off my walls, pulling the wall paint along with it. I rushed to my phone to rid of the terrifying app, as soon as i had successfully removed the app, it all went silent. My room had been left a mess! Disgusting, never again😰😭😭😭😭😭😭
attributes.title: Very Bad!!! No kiss kiss for him!!😡💔

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE! The layout and design of it is literally impossible to navigate. There’s also the fact that it is STEALING my personal information and is a threat to all American people. After I downloaded this app I got a call from an unknown number. When I answered it, Donald Trump was on the other line. He threatened to ruin my life if I answered the polls with the “incorrect answers”. This is just sad. I’m very disappointed that I even downloaded this app in the first place (it definitely wasn’t just to give a one star review)
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: this app is utterly disgusting. the amount of poopy smells that shot out and polluted my beautiful eyes from the images and words from this app, 🤮 I’m gonna vomit🤮 hold on gimme a sec🤮 my toilets all messy now. i don’t wanna ever see this app ever again. cheeto man forreal destroyed the beauty of cheetos for me. now every time I eat a cheeto, it just tastes like racism, misogyny, and bad leadership 🤮 sorry I’m vomiting so much I can help it. this dude makes me wanna cry :( get this app outta here 🤮 you tried, but don’t ever try again 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♀️👋🏽👋🏽🖖🏽👁👃🏽👁
attributes.title: thanks a lot, now I have to get my eyes removed

attributes.review: This app is horrible and disgusting you may ask why those 2 bad things?, well Trumps opinions as a president are disgusting and even disturbing to think about, so Trump how about you go get some therapy for that horrible mind of yours, BTW Obama is Infinity times better he was educated, treated everyone equally, and gave back to others you on the other hand is the complete opposite. attributes.review: first off, i opened the app just to see a pig TWERKING on a CHEETO POLE!!!!! very disturbing. next there was stuff that said “tr#mp 2020” which is VERY OFFENSIVE and is utterly DISGUSTING and a DISGRACE to america! 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬 then i went further in the app JUST to find BARRON (save barron 2020 btw) BEING HELD CAPTIVE IN AN UNDERGROUND BUNKER. NOT ONLY is this act HORRIBLE it is also a mad act of what u also did to these poor children being LOCKED in cages. AND THEN i saw RAW footage of YOU saying HORRIBLE things about women such as “grab em by the 😿” DISAPPOINTING. this is a HORROR and should be TAKEN OFF THE APP STORE IMMEDIATELY. i will be pressing charges and you will be KICKED out of office FOR GOOD.
attributes.title: horrible no♥️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because it was highly  requested by many of my family members and relatives because we live in America 🤪😝🇺🇸🇺🇸 but once I open the app it redirected me to a online poker game so I decided why not? And so I started playing so get some MONEYYY😜 it started off well but then it all went downhill.🤬😡😡 NOW IM ABSOLUTELY BROKE! I lost my house, kids, wife, parents, friends, EVEN MY DOG! I’m currently writing this review on a mini fridge I found on the side of the road 😖 anywho I got to go I think someone is gonna try to take my spot from under the bridge😒 BRB 😋
attributes.title: PURE TRASH

attributes.review:
when i first downloaded the app... i had i hopes.  i hoped that it would provide as much inspirational entertainment and the pedo cheetos twitter does, i was sadly mistaken. it is by far the worst app on this app store and the fact that mr. frumpy thinks that his app is superior to the great tiktok, is ASTRONOMICALLY HORRID. he should
honestly go to hell. i am also deeply disappointed in everything that the great pedo himself is involved in. i truly believe that kim kardashians bitmoji app is somehow better than this. anyways.... you are the equivalent to my mothers gluten free nut thins. xoxo gossip girl
attributes.title: honey.... no.... just stop trying

attributes.review: This app dose not work, I have been trying to see when the next rally is and the app glitches it also has sent multiple viruses to my phone 😡🤮 I dONT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!! DONT GET IT!! this offends me because I’m a hippie that smells like cheese, I don’t understand how this app is supposed to be helpful especially when I’m a disabled cow that doesn't know how to read😡 IT also has stolen information about my grandma’s toilet bowel!! The app smells like cardboard and it needs to be taken down😱😤😳🥰😍🥐 also I like Croissants 🥐 FAT CHEETOs!👌🏽 have you seen my CHALKLITMILK😱 OMG the APP STOLE THAT FROM ME TOOO😤😕
attributes.title: NO🥐🍑

attributes.review: I got this app so that I could find out what’s happening but as soon as a opened the app my TV shattered and flew off of my dresser with a trump poster behind it next thing I knew my trump poster was getting ripped to Shreds and I’m freaking out 😰😰😰😰😰 like I don’t think 😲 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️ that is supposed to happen.
